title: Bug 116786 - Library include does not store relative path
description: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. Currently, it does not save the relative path and instead uses an absolute path.
OB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path. Instead, it uses an absolute path.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a report design in $project/test directory. 
2. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary in the report design.
